reviewText: Was a very encouraging film. Heard a lot about the Bakers, but it was nice to see their home and what they are doing. Reasured us about our monthly financial contributions to IRIS. They are a solid God fearing community and are continuing preaching the kingdom of Heaven.

reviewText: I had told my daughter about this movie a year ago.  She mentioned it to me about a week ago and said she was going to order it some day.  I ordered it and sent it to her.  She called today to thank me and tell me how very much she liked it.The movie really shows the goodness that this woman performed and encourages all to do better to help others.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This documentary really challenged my faith and raised my expectations of the power of God's love on this earth. Do not watch this and just discount what happens as unattainable for all believers. God has work for all of us to do and Heidi Baker tells us just what we can do. I bought her book for myself and my daughters. We all need to be challenged to love like Jesus.
summary: Mama Heidi , the power and love of God
Title: N/A

reviewText: This fantastic documentary follows the ministry of Heidi and Roland Baker, missionaries in war torn Mozambique. This is a fantastic visual to the book by the Baker's entitled Always Enough: God's Miraculous Provision Among the Poorest Children on Earth.This video introduces the viewer to the tough reality of life in Mozambique and the struggles that the people and especially children face there every day. It follows them in their local medical facilities and out onto the streets, taking care of children by feeding, clothing and educating them so that today's orphans will be tomorrows leaders. It also tells the story of Rolland and Heidi, how they came to Mozambique and what they do there. Heidi says in the video that it would be too overwhelming for her to do what God has called her to do in that country, so God told her to "just love the one in front of you" and He would do the rest.Not only is God's faithfulness glorified in this video, but it also inspires the viewer to compassion and Christ likeness. I really enjoyed this video and have shown it to many individuals and church groups. Iris ministries (The Baker's ministry name) continues to show the love of God in Mozambique to this day, maybe this video will inspire you and your church to visit or get involved in helping the poor and needy.
summary: Loving the One in Front of You
Title: N/A

reviewText: I buy a lot of Christian movies that I later give away because there isn't much to them, but this one is WONDERFUL! It is more of a documentary than a movie which bothered me for about 3 minutes until I got into it. I was humbled and inspired at the same time by Heidi Baker's love, courage and strength in the face of tremendous persecution and lack.
Title: N/A
